#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Usage =

== Markup ==
{{{
<div id="win" icon="icon-save" title="My Window">
  Window Content
</div>
}}}

== jQuery ==

To create window
{{{
$('#win').window(options)
}}}

To invoke window method
{{{
$('#win').window('open')
}}}

= Options =
Override defaults with $.fn.window.defaults
